column4: I've burned many cds/dvds. The engineering tolerances nowadays are very tight and the manufacturers compete over price, so units do sometimes fail spontaneously, more so than they used to. Another possibility is poor media (are you really using some knock off Indian brand?). In your place, I would boot into windows and see if you can successfully burn from there...
